metadata.synopsis: Dialog file for the Flaming Fist Guard 02  in the Lower City park. Bored dialog before the ambush, worried dialog after the ambush.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Talk to the Flaming Fist Guard 02 when they aren't in combat.

0.speaker: Fist Pard
0.text: Just my luck to get assigned to Captain Cracklewall. Mad as piss, that one.

1.speaker: Fist Pard
1.text: I wasn't even supposed to be on duty today - had plans to go fishing.

2.speaker: Fist Pard
2.text: Who were that lot?! Need to report this - need to get reinforcements!
